content: rasta ready yarn 1 skein malabrigo rasta 100% merino 90 yds needles and notions us 15 dpn markers small stitch holder large tapestry needle gauge 2 5 sts= 1 size women s medium rasta ready s instructions right mitt glossary co 16 sts join in the round being careful not to twist sts co = cast on round 1-9 knit round 10 work thumb gusset as follows k2 place bobble = bind off marker m1r k1 m1l place marker knit to end m1r = make one right slanting of round 3 sts between markers increase round 11 knit m1l = make one left slanting increase round 12 k2 pm m1r k3 m1l pm knit to end of round 5 sts between marker pm = pass marker round 13-18 knit round = round round 19 k2 remove markers slip 5 sts to holder k2tog = knit 2 stitches together co 1 st using backwards loop or e wrap co join and knit to end of round ssk = slip slip knit decrease round 20-26 knit bobble loosely st s = stitch es thumb slip 5 sts from holder onto 2 needles using a third needle pick up and knit 5 sts on top of thumb opening knit 5 10 sts total the beginning of the round is the first picked up st round 1 k2tog k1 k2tog k5 round 2-3 knit bobble loosely left mitt begin gusset 3 sts from end of round continue as for right mitt note 1 skein will yield 3 ½ mitts thus 2 skeins will make 3 pairs or make one pair and one set of wrist warmers from 1 skein …co 16 sts knit in the round for 20 rnds and bobble 2012/revised 2017 this is a free pattern from buttonjar knits enjoy thank you for purchasing this pattern © copyright 2017 julie cashin | buttonjar knits| davidson nc for personal and individual use only
